percentage - Variable in class cardfidelitysystem.FidelityCard
 
personalizeMeal(String) - Static method in class commandinterface.ClientConsole
modify the ingredient quantity of a meal by adding the quantity, quantity = 0 means remove Eg.
personalizeMeal(String, String, int) - Method in class commandinterface.CommandConsole
add a certain quantity of an ingredient to the meal quantity = 0 means to remove the ingredient
personalizeMeal(AbstractMeal, Ingredient, int) - Method in class orders.Order
personalizeMeal by modifying the quantity of certain ingredient
